title: Foundation in Backend Development
description: Before diving into blockchain, a strong foundation in general software development is crucial. Master a backend language, understand how APIs work, and be proficient with databases and version control.

title: Understand Blockchain Fundamentals
description: Learn the core concepts of blockchain technology. Understand how it works, including concepts like decentralization, consensus mechanisms (Proof of Work vs. Proof of Stake), cryptography, and the architecture of major blockchains like Bitcoin and Ethereum.
qualifications: A solid theoretical understanding of blockchain

title: Learn Smart Contract Development
description: This is the core skill. Learn Solidity, the primary language for writing smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. Practice writing, testing, and deploying smart contracts using frameworks like Hardhat or Truffle.
qualifications: A portfolio of deployed smart contracts on a testnet

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Work for a Web3 company or as a freelance developer. You will build and maintain smart contracts for dApps (decentralized applications), work on DeFi protocols, or develop NFT projects. Most opportunities are with international companies and are remote.
qualifications: Experience working on a production dApp
institutes: Remote jobs on Web3-specific job boards

title: Senior Blockchain Developer / Protocol Engineer
description: Advance to a senior role where you architect complex smart contract systems, contribute to the core protocol of a blockchain, or lead a team of developers. This requires deep expertise in security, scalability, and blockchain architecture.
qualifications: Recognized as an expert in the field
institutes: N/A - Based on experience and reputation
